trans-unit.source: Provides a managed wrapper around a High Level Shading Language (HLSL) pixel shader.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en behandlet tekstbryting rundt pikselskygger høyt nivå skygge språket (HLSL).

trans-unit.source: Use the PixelShader class to access pre-compiled HLSL bytecode in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application.
trans-unit.target: Bruk støtter pikselskygge klassen tilgang over kompilerte HLSL bytekode i et Windows presentasjon Foundation (WPF)-program.

trans-unit.source: You can create a PixelShader from a Pack URI reference or from a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan opprette en støtter pikselskygge fra en pakke-URI-referanse eller <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource%2A> property or call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.SetStreamSource%2A> method to load the shader bytecode.
trans-unit.target: Angi den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource%2A>egenskapen eller kall av <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.SetStreamSource%2A>metode for å laste inn shader bytekode.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.SetStreamSource%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create a custom effect, assign the PixelShader to the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect.PixelShader%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette en egendefinert effekt tilordnes av støtter pikselskygge <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect.PixelShader%2A>for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect.PixelShader%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying this object's dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (which may no longer resolve), but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer egenskaper for dette objektet avhengighet, kopierer denne metoden ressursen referanser og data bindinger (som ikke kan løse), men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method can be used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: Metoden klone kan brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A> method to provide a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skygger arvet når som helst, <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>metode for å angi en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of this instance.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The returned clone is effectively a deep copy of the current object.
trans-unit.target: Den returnerte klone er effektivt en dyp kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The clone's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Klone <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are copied.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men gjeldende verdier kopieres.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the render thread cannot process the pixel shader.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når gjengivelse tråden ikke kan behandle pikselskygger.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Assigns the <xref:System.IO.Stream> to use as the source of HLSL bytecode.
trans-unit.target: Tilordner den <xref:System.IO.Stream>skal brukes som kilde for HLSL bytekode.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream to read the HLSL bytecode from.
trans-unit.target: Kan lese HLSL bytekode fra dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: source is .
trans-unit.target: sourceis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use hardware or software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil bruke maskinvare eller programvare gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> renders in hardware when there is a capable hardware accelerator; otherwise, it renders in software.
trans-unit.target: Som standard en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>gjengir i maskinvare når det er en kvalifisert maskinvare for; hvis ikke, den ligger i programvaren.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>

trans-unit.source: The ShaderRenderMode property alters this behavior, based on its value.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ShaderRenderMode endrer dette problemet, basert på verdien.

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, and there is no capable hardware available, the entire <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, og det finnes ingen kvalifisert maskinvare tilgjengelig, hele <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> always renders using software rendering.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>gjengir alltid ved hjelp av programvaregjengivelse.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>

trans-unit.source: If set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> has the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: Hvis satt til <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect>har standard virkemåte.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderEffect> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode"></xref> value that indicates whether to force the use of hardware or software rendering for the effect.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Effects.ShaderRenderMode"> </xref> verdi som angir om du vil tvinge gjennom bruk av maskinvare eller programvare gjengivelse for effekten.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.ShaderRenderMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.ShaderRenderMode*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.ShaderRenderMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Pack URI reference to HLSL bytecode in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en pakke-URI-referanse til HLSL bytekode i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> is a Pack URI reference to a file inside the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Uri>er en pakke-URI-referanse til en fil i samlingen.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: The Pack URI reference to HLSL bytecode in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: Pakke-URI-referanse til HLSL bytekode i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.PixelShader.UriSource*>

trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
